definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: female (perforata (Ba:NB 166); so Thes and most; > another view in Schwally ZAW xi (1891), 181 f.; Idiot. 57; NH = BH; Aram. [[נוּקְבָּא]], [[נוּקְבְּתָא]], neqbo0, neqbto0);—alw. abs. ´[[נ]] Je 31:22 + 21 t. (all Pent., and all P exc. De 4:16):
woman (or female child) Je 31:22 (opp. [[גֶּבֶר]]), Ge 1:27, Ge 5:2, Le 12:5, Le 12:7, Le 15:33, Le 27:4, Le 27:5, Le 27:6, Le 27:7) Nu 5:3 (all opp. [[זׇבָר]]), Nu 31:15.
female animal Ge 6:19, Ge 7:3, Ge 7:9, Ge 7:16, Le 3:1, Le 3:6, (all opp. [[זׇכָר]]), Le 4:28, Le 4:32, Le 5:6.—De 4:16 (opp. [[זׇבָר]]) may include both women and animals.
